icons.title: Question
icons.name: question-stroke
icons.desc: Alert user of option to learn more about relative content

icons.title: Warning
icons.name: warning-stroke
icons.desc: Alerts user of troubling or concerning situation

icons.title: Question
icons.name: question-filled
icons.desc: Alert user of option to learn more about relative content

icons.title: Warning
icons.name: warning-filled
icons.desc: Alerts user of troubling or concerning situation

icons.title: Discount code applied
icons.name: discount-code-applied
icons.desc: A confirmation that a code has been applied

icons.title: First class upgrade available
icons.name: first-class-upgrade-available
icons.desc: Denotes that there is an immediate upgrade to FC available

icons.title: First class upgrade waitlist
icons.name: first-class-upgrade-waitlist
icons.desc: Denotes that guests can join a waitlist to upgrade to FC

icons.title: Free same day change
icons.name: free-same-day-change
icons.desc: Some short, frequent flights aka 'shuttle flights' allow for free same day changes

icons.title: Mixed cabin itinerary
icons.name: mixed-cabin-itinerary
icons.desc: A guest will be in different cabins for different segments of the trip

icons.title: Not recommended for standby
icons.name: not-recommended-for-standby
icons.desc: Viewable by travelers with guest passes to fly standby - this route has a low chance of standby availability

icons.title: Premium class upgrade available
icons.name: premium-class-upgrade-available
icons.desc: Denotes that there is an immediate upgrade to PC available

icons.title: Premium class upgrade waitlist
icons.name: premium-class-upgrade-waitlist
icons.desc: Denotes that guests can join a waitlist to upgrade to PC

icons.title: Recommended for standby travel but monitor
icons.name: recommended-for-standby-travel-but-monitor
icons.desc: Viewable by travelers with guest passes to fly standby - this route has a medium chance of standby availability

icons.title: Recommended for standby
icons.name: recommended-for-standby
icons.desc: Viewable by travelers with guest passes to fly standby - this route has a high chance of standby availability

icons.title: Route pending government approval
icons.name: route-pending-government-approval
icons.desc: A new route that is waiting for official government approval

icons.title: View password
icons.name: view-password
icons.desc: Icon indicates that the password is currently hidden

icons.title: Hide password
icons.name: hide-password
icons.desc: Icon indicates that the password is currently visible

icons.name: filter
icons.desc: Indicates that content can be filtered

icons.title: This indicates a link to an external site that may not follow the same accessibility or privacy policies as Alaska Airlines. By selecting a partner link you agree to share your data with these sites.
icons.name: external-link
icons.desc: Notice indicator to alert user with disabilities that action will result in the browser opening a new context.

icons.title: This indicates a link to an external site that may not follow the same accessibility or privacy policies as Alaska Airlines. By selecting a partner link you agree to share your data with these sites.
icons.name: external-link-md
icons.desc: Notice indicator to alert user with disabilities that action will result in the browser opening a new context.

icons.title: This indicates a link to an external site that may not follow the same accessibility or privacy policies as Alaska Airlines. By selecting a partner link you agree to share your data with these sites.
icons.name: external-link-sm
icons.desc: Notice indicator to alert user with disabilities that action will result in the browser opening a new context.

icons.title: Contract fare
icons.name: contract-fare
icons.desc: A fare rate for companies that have a contract with Alaska Air

icons.title: Government fare
icons.name: government-fare
icons.desc: A fare rate only visible only to government employees

icons.title: Government mixed fare
icons.name: government-mixed-fare
icons.desc: Some segments of this journey include government fare rates, others do not

icons.title: Contract mixed fare
icons.name: contract-mixed-fare
icons.desc: Some segments of this journey include contract fare rates, others do not

icons.title: QR code
icons.name: qr-code
icons.desc: indicates availability of a QR code

icons.name: boarding
icons.desc: icon used to indicate boarding options

icons.name: elite
icons.desc: icon used to indicate elite passenger status

icons.name: food-and-drink
icons.desc: icon used for food and drink

icons.name: one-way-arrow
icons.desc: indication of one way flight option

icons.name: gift
icons.desc: indicate when a guest receives or has earned a gift such as a complimentary food item

icons.title: First Class legroom
icons.name: first-class-legroom
icons.desc: Indicates additional legroom for First Class cabin

icons.title: Premium Class legroom
icons.name: premium-class-legroom
icons.desc: Indicates additional legroom for Premium Class cabin

icons.title: Lounge
icons.name: lounge
icons.desc: Represents the Alaska Lounge or partner lounge access.

icons.title: This content from Alaska Airlines will open in a new tab or window.
icons.name: new-window
icons.desc: Notice indicator to alert users that action will result in the browser opening a new tab or window.

icons.title: pre-travel testing and Covid-19 related information
icons.name: covid-test
icons.desc: Indicates pre-travel testing and Covid-19 related information

icons.title: cleaning information
icons.name: spraybottle
icons.desc: Indicates that there is information about cleaning

icons.title: pin trip
icons.name: pin-trip
icons.desc: Pin icon showing travel from point to point

icons.title: tag

icons.desc: Tag with aurora line at bottom
